name: Yuu Amano
main_effect:
[Start of Your Main Phase] By placing 1 Digimon card with ＜Save＞ in its text from your hand under this Tamer, gain 1 memory.
[Your Turn] When one of your Digimon would digivolve into a Digimon card with ＜Save＞ in its text, by suspending this Tamer and placing 1 card from under one of your Tamers as the bottom digivolution card of that Digimon, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
source_effect: Security Effect [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

name: Yuugo Kamishiro
main_effect:

[Your Turn] When any of your Digimon or Tamers with the [CS] trait would be played, by returning this Tamer to the bottom of the deck, reduce the play cost by 2.

name: Zanbamon

[All Turns] This Digimon gains all of the effects on cards with [Gammamon] in its name in this Digimon's digivolution cards.
